0: Clean smart quiet rooms comfy bed great attentive staff
We got a great deal with grand opening prices so the stay was well worth it
Short stay on arrival from uk
Good location close to the beach restaurants and shops
Espresso machine in the room was a nice touch
Nice hotel great location great pool with direct access to our he beach
Super friendly service unlike the rest of Miami
1: I am not giving a perfect 55 in most areas because on my first day I had to request to have the room cleaned at 3 pm although I had been out since early in the am
Compared to other structures I would say it is quite good
The bathroom could have had a little more space
He seemed to be working a double shift considering how often he was at the front desk
The fee to use the pool and beach chairs was a bit of a shock though the concierge by the beach was friendly and helpful
They do n’t have heaters in many rooms so we had to change rooms and even then they did n’t work right

Service in the restaurant bar pool and reception was extremely slow waiting on average 15 mins before anyone acknowledged you and then waiting a further 1520 mins for a menu to be brought very poor slow service
It does a great job of joining guests with the local scene by means of activities and activations
Otherwise the hotel staff is lazy and does n’t care about their guests
